properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
1. DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM S/V HEIDI,
   ONE PERSON ON BOARD, IN 47-54.73N 020-34.60W
   AT 021129Z NOV. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
   PHONE: 44 344 382 0025,
   E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2500/23.
